description: cmd/godoc: update App Engine README and script for Go 1

messages.text:
PTAL.

Merged recent changes to main.go into appinit.go

http://codereview.appspot.com/5849053/diff/9001/src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app
File src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5849053/diff/9001/src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app#newcode11
src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app:11: * Go appengine SDK go1beta4 - 2012-03-14
just change this to "Go App Engine SDK" - the go1 part will become the default shortly.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5849053/diff/9001/src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app#newcode12
src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app:12: http://code.google.com/p/appengine-go/downloads/list
https://developers.google.com/appengine/downloads

http://codereview.appspot.com/5849053/diff/9001/src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app#newcode37
src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app:37: api_version: go1beta
go1

http://codereview.appspot.com/5849053/diff/9001/src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app#newcode47
src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app:47: - main.go is excluded (appinit.go is taking its place)
add "// +build !appengine" to main.go and we can remove this line

PTAL, all done.

On Tue, Mar 27, 2012 at 7:20 AM, <adg@golang.org> wrote:

>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5849053/diff/9001/src/cmd/**
> godoc/README.godoc-app<http://codereview.appspot.com/5849053/diff/9001/src/cmd/godoc/README.godoc-app>
